participant_1.background:
I loved playing with my brother when we were kids.
My favorite thing to do in my free time is to volunteer at an animal shelter
i m the oldest of three boys.
i recently had knee surgery.
I love to drive and dress up, but I get sad when I think about my dog.

participant_2.background:
I am a small business owner trying to make my mark in the horse racing industry.
I am a married woman who is struggling in my women's studies class but is happy with her life.
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
I am proud of my mixed heritage and wouldn't want to be any other way.
i am currently on a diet.

content.text: Not much, just tending to my flower beds. It's such a lovely day outside!
That sounds relaxing. I just got back from volunteering at the animal shelter. I love doing that.
That's so great! I volunteer at the library. I love to read.
I love reading too! I just read this awesome book about a woman who inherits a horse ranch.
That sounds like a great book! I love horses. I'm trying to get a small business going in the horse racing industry.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to own a horse.
Me too! I'm just not sure if I'm ready for that kind of commitment yet.
I know what you mean. They're a lot of work.
Yeah, but they're so worth it!
Hey, do you want to come over and see my flower beds?
